entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multiple entities owning the same object hierarchy breaks migrations #26333
  • EF CLI using ToTable(null) causes migration to drop non-existing column #26331
  • "The value of shadow key property 'PROPERTYNAME' is unknown when attempting to save changes" on tracked entities #26330
  • Hidden Columns Removed in EF Core 6 RC 2 Scaffold #26329
  • string case sensitivity not working #26328
  • HasQueryFilter is ignored by aggregate functions #26327
  • Support `ValueTuple(string, object | NpgsqlDbType)` parameters for raw sql queries #26326

Closed

  • Query/InMemory: Distance_constant_lhs fails on in Memory #19661
    MQ
  • InvalidOperationException when projection is used with OData #24092
    MQ
  • OData filter on 2nd level nested property System.InvalidOperationException could not be translated #23135
    MQ
  • [Bug]: The Property uses `ValueGenerator` in complex FK is not tracked correctly #26332
  • Update to Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData 8.0.1 #25262
    MQ
  • Cosmos: remove automatic composition of discriminator filter in raw SQL queries #26124
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • [TINY] Removing unnecessary spatial test for InMemory #26335
    auto-merge
  • Some regression tests for OData related issues #26324
    auto-merge
  • Add TL;DR section for daily builds #26300
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26325
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26323
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26321
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Cosmos: remove automatic composition of discriminator filter in raw SQL queries #26292
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #26318
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • update odata tests to 8.0 #26201

Updated

  • Fix double negation in SQL generation #26313
